name: Swedish Fika
description:
A cozy management game about making the best possible staff room for your coworkers.

  • Buy many kinds of fika and watch your coworkers stuff their faces!
  • Buy furniture and decorate the room the way you want or the way they want!
  • Change color of the furniture and make the room uniquely yours.
  • Check the whiteboard to find out what your coworkers really want in the space!
  • ???
  • Profit!

Made by a small team over the course of 5 weeks:

Axel Joelsson - Lead Programmer, Technical Artist, Game Design

Gabriella Tångfelt - Programming, 3D Modelling, Texturing, Music, SFX, Game Design

Malin Hallgren - Lead Art, Concept Art, 3D Modelling, Texturing, SFX, Game Design

Lukas Isaksson - Animation, 3D Modelling, Texturing, Music, Programming, Game Design
